name: Dragon War
description:
current version includes a basic single battle mode with AI in a simple map with weather effects and day night systems.
you can choose one of the six flying dragons that you like to fight with computer players in the scene.

Including Dragons：


#1 Desert Dragon.
#2 Forest Dragon.
#3 Plains Dragon.
#4 Polar Dragon.
#5 Undead Dragon.
#6 Volcano Dragon.

Find all the other flying dragons around you and kill them with your claws and teeth or your magic fireball.
